General.Name: Transcend Information Inc
General.Description: Transcend Information, Inc. engages in manufacturing, processing, and selling computer software and hardware, peripheral equipment, and other computer components in Taiwan, rest of Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company provides internal and portable solid state drives; external hard drives, such as portable hard drives, desktop external hard drives, and accessories; personal cloud storage solutions; memory cards, including SD, microSD, CFexpress, CompactFlash, CFast 2.0, and Mac Expansion Cards; dashcams and accessories; USB flash drives; and card readers, hubs, and DVD writers and adaptors, as well as Mac and customized solutions. It also offers embedded solutions, such as SATA, PATA, PCIe, Half-Slim, and mSATA SSD products; PATA and USB flash modules; DRAM module solutions; and software solutions for management, monitoring, rescue, and security purposes. The company's products are used in transportation, healthcare, embedded, digital entertainment, cloud computing, industry 4.0, and military applications. Transcend Information, Inc. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1.Name: Mr. Sheng-Yin  Hsiao
1.Title: CFO, Financial & Accounting Officer and Head of Corp. Governance
